surya.name: surya
surya.title: Surya Villa
surya.description: Surya Villa is equipped with a king-size luxury mattress and a sofa. Look forward to a serene outdoor view as you plunge into your private infinity pool and listen to the gentle breeze of Bali.

akasha.name: akasha
akasha.title: Akasha: 3 bedroom luxury villa
akasha.description: Luxury meets comfort in our newest villa, Akasha. With 3 bedrooms and 3.5 baths, this spacious home is great for families or couples traveling. This villa features a beautiful waterfall pool, large deck, full kitchen and bar, entertainment room, outdoor living room, large dining area, and breathtaking views. This space is also great for hosting celebrations such as weddings and birthday parties.
